Question: This person was approached by a beer company to endorse their product.
Hints: This person returned to Australia and toured New Zealand for the first time in 2007 to support the Straight Outta Lynwood album.
The parody was pulled from this person's Straight Outta Lynwood because of his label's unwillingness to "go to war" with Atlantic.
Several days later, this person and his band were the opening act for Missing Persons.
